label: ham
subject: Re: [perl #43315] [TODO] config/inter/lex.pm:  Write unit tests
body: 80 (return) [ This Gothic chieftain is called by Jornandes and Isidore, Athaulphus; by Zosimus and Orosius, Ataulphus; and by Olympiodorus, Adaoulphus. I have used the celebrated name of Adolphus, which seems to be authorized by the practice of the Swedes, the sons or brothers of the ancient Goths.]
